sources.title: Deluge (1933)
sources.description: Based on a novel by S. Fowler Wright. For a long while, a copy of this film that was dubbed in Italian was the only one known to exist.  In 2016, a good copy was found in France.

sources.title: Deluge 1933 Colorized
sources.description: Gripping post-apocalyptic drama about a cataclysmic earthquake and flood that destroy the world, and how various survivors cope with their circumstances. Surprisingly well-done disaster special effects for a film of its time. Stars Sydney Blackmer, Peggy Shannon and Fred Kohler. IMDB page: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0023938 Colorization by EzzyFallsOut using DeOldify technology. (Note: Although this movie is public domain, the colorization is copyright by me. My colorized movies are freely uploaded for free personal use. Please don't put them on your own YouTube channel and monetize them. Thanks.)

sources.title: DELUGE image quality upgrade
sources.description: This print has improved contrast and luminosity. Also it is an undivided MPEG4 (MP4) file for convenient downloading. “Disturbing” “Quite good” “Remarkable” “See it if you can” (IMDB reviews quotes). An end of the world fantasy and romantic drama noted for its remarkable special effects. Good cast headed by Sidney Blackmer and Peggy Shannon. Filmed in part at the Bronson Canyon caves, Griffith Park, Los Angeles. Recommended. IMDB rating 6.2. Directed by Felix E Feist. Released in 1933. Complete print (Canadian version). PRODUCTION NOTE: The special effects and other production costs proved to be far beyond the financial resources of little KBS Productions, which was forced into bankruptcy

metadata.Plot: New York City awaits a massive series of tidal waves which has already struck the North American west coast. As the waves strike and destroy the city, Martin is separated from his family. Seemingly the only survivor, he meets Claire, and they give one another aid and comfort during the crisis. Later, other survivors arise. As society attempts to rebuild, Martin and his wife Helen reunite. Claire, who has shared a great deal with Martin during their time alone, informs Helen that she will not live without Martin.
metadata.Writer: S. Fowler Wright, John F. Goodrich, Warren Duff
metadata.Actors: Peggy Shannon, Lois Wilson, Sidney Blackmer
